title: Lemony Red Pepper and Asparagus Pasta Salad
directions: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente, adding asparagus for the last 2 minutes.
Drain and rinse with cold water; drain again. Set aside in a large bowl.
Lemon Dressing: In a small bowl, combine lemon zest, lemon juice, honey, mustard salt and pepper; slowly whisk in oil until emulsified.
Add red peppers and chives; toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate for 6 hours. (Make ahead: Refrigerate for up to 24 hours.)
ingredients: 1 bunch (1 lb/ 450g) asparagus cut in 1-1/2 inch (4 cm) pieces
1 jar (370ml) roasted red peppers drained and sliced
